mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_MEMBER(OM_CNTNUM,OM_NUM,P_NO,U_CNT,M_ID,OM_DATE,OM_PAY,P_PRICE,OM_STATE,OM_CANCLE,OM_CDATE,C_REASON) VALUES(ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')||#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param1},SYSDATE,'포인트', (SELECT P_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NO=#{param2})*#{param3},'결제완료','N',NULL,NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT OM_CNTNUM,OM_NUM,P_NO,U_CNT,M_ID,OM_DATE,OM_PAY,P_PRICE,OM_STATE,OM_CANCLE,OM_CDATE,C_REASON,OM_DELCANCLE, P_NAME,P_COLOR,P_SIZE,P_FILESRC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, PAGEOM.* FROM (SELECT OM_CNTNUM,OM_NUM,P_NO,U_CNT,M_ID,OM_DATE,OM_PAY,P_PRICE,OM_STATE,OM_CANCLE,OM_CDATE,C_REASON,OM_DELCANCLE, P_NAME,P_COLOR,P_SIZE,P_FILESRC FROM (SELECT OM.OM_CNTNUM,OM.OM_NUM,OM.P_NO,OM.U_CNT,OM.M_ID,OM.OM_DATE,OM.OM_PAY,OM.P_PRICE,OM.OM_STATE,OM.OM_CANCLE,OM.OM_CDATE,OM.C_REASON,OM.OM_DELCANCLE, P.P_NAME,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC FROM ORDER_MEMBER OM INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OM.P_NO=P.P_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{param1} ORDER BY OM_DATE DESC) PAGEOM) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_CASH=M_CASH-#{param2} WHERE M_ID=#{param1}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(OM_NUM) FROM ORDER_MEMBER WHERE M_ID=#{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_MEMBER WHERE M_ID=#{param1}
